channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former Humana CEO Bruce Broussard joins Define Ventures as venture partner
item.description: Former Humana CEO and president Bruce Broussard will be joining VC firm Define Ventures as a venture partner, Fortune can exclusively report.

item.title: Over 20 world leaders head to Russia for BRICS summit as Putin tries to rival west
item.description: President Vladimir Putin is seeking to show Western attempts to isolate Moscow over the two-and-a-half-year offensive have failed.

item.title: World’s largest sovereign wealth fund posts $76 billion in quarterly profit as interest rates fall
item.description: Norway's gigantic sovereign wealth fund on Tuesday reported third-quarter profit of 835 billion Norwegian kroner ($76.3 billion).

item.title: Russia pushes 'new world order' agenda as it hosts beefed-up BRICS summit
item.description: Russia is rolling out the red carpet to its allies on Tuesday as it hosts the latest BRICS summit in a show of strength to the West.

item.title: European Union’s car market slumps further in September
Boeing to show a big quarterly loss as investors wait for strike to end
Harris leads Trump by 20 points with younger Americans, new CNBC Generation Lab survey finds
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris now holds a 20 point lead former President Trump when it comes to younger voters between 18 and 34

item.title: Meet Tim Cook, Nike consigliere
item.description: Just do it. And by "it," we mean "pick a new CEO."

item.title: Hyundai Motor India shares drop in debut after country’s biggest ever IPO
item.description: A booming stock market in the world's fifth-largest economy has stoked an IPO frenzy over the last two years, with start-ups and established companies...

item.title: Citi upgrades First Solar, says shares will benefit regardless of U.S. presidential election outcome
item.description: The bank lifted its rating to buy from neutral on the solar stock.

item.title: The AI bubble is looking worse than the dot-com bubble. Here’s why.
CVS just ousted Karen Lynch. Why women CEOs are 45% more likely to get fired.
More startups are being spun out of Klarna than any other European fintech unicorn
item.description: Alumni from Klarna have gone on to create 62 new startups — more than any other fintech unicorn in Europe, according to a new report from VC firm Acce...

item.title: Ireland threatens to fine Facebook and TikTok if they don’t end ‘Wild West’ of harmful content
item.description: Social media firms breaching the rules face fines of up to €20 million or 10% of their annual turnover.

item.title: SAP overtakes ASML to become Europe’s most valuable tech company
